Class Level2ShipBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.ShipBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.Level2ShipBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShipBoardClient, Serializable
public class Level2ShipBoard extends ShipBoard implements ShipBoardClient
Represents a Level 2 ship board in the game. This class defines the layout and specific behaviors of the ship board at Level 2, including valid positions, defense capabilities, component booking, and life support systems. Level 2 is an intermediate ship configuration with enhanced functionality compared to Level 1: - Can defend itself with single cannons based on direction - Allows booking up to 2 components - Inherits life support system and alien acceptance capabilities from the parent class
See Also:

    • isOutsideShipboard

      public static boolean isOutsideShipboard(int x, int y)
      Determines if the specified coordinates are outside the valid ship board area.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate to check
      y - the y-coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates are outside the ship board, false otherwise

    • book

      public void book()
      Books the currently focused component if possible. If there are already 2 or more inactive components, the booking fails and an error notification is sent to the player. Otherwise, the component is added to the inactive components list, and all clients are notified of the successful booking.

    • canDifendItselfWithSingleCannons

      public boolean canDifendItselfWithSingleCannons(DangerousObj obj)
      Checks if this ship board can defend itself against a dangerous object using single cannons. The defense capability depends on the direction of the incoming threat: - For NORTH direction, checks if there's a cannon at the exact coordinate - For other directions, checks if there's a cannon at the exact coordinate or adjacent positions
      Specified by:
      canDifendItselfWithSingleCannons in interface ShipBoardClient
      Specified by:
      canDifendItselfWithSingleCannons in class ShipBoard
      Parameters:
      obj - the dangerous object that is threatening the ship
      Returns:
      true if the ship can defend itself with single cannons, false otherwise

    • focusReservedComponent

      public void focusReservedComponent(int choice)
      Sets focus on a reserved component from the list of booked components. Does nothing if the provided index is out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      choice - the index of the reserved component to focus on

    • getCabinsWithLifeSupport

      public Map<Coordinates,Set<ColorLifeSupport>> getCabinsWithLifeSupport()
      Returns a map of coordinates to life support colors for all cabins with life support. This implementation delegates to the parent class.
      Specified by:
      getCabinsWithLifeSupport in interface ShipBoardClient
      Overrides:
      getCabinsWithLifeSupport in class ShipBoard
      Returns:
